entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
